meanings.definition: A store where dry goods are sold.
meanings.sent1: I visited the drysaltery to buy some flour and sugar.
meanings.sent2: The drysaltery on the corner always has fresh spices and grains.
meanings.sent3: The drysaltery had a sale on dried fruits, so I bought a whole bunch!
meanings.sent4: Her kitchen cabinets were like a drysaltery, filled with neatly organized jars and bags of ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the drysaltery was a delightful mix of herbs and teas.

meanings.definition: The goods sold in a drysaltery store.
meanings.sent1: The variety of items in the drysaltery included nuts, seeds, and dried fruits.
meanings.sent2: Customers often find unique spices and condiments in the drysaltery.
meanings.sent3: The drysaltery's shelves were overflowing with colorful packages of snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her pantry looked like a mini drysaltery with all the different types of pasta and rice.
meanings.sent5: The drysaltery displayed an array of exotic teas and coffees.
